org.apache.flink.client.program

类 ClusterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
  • 直接已知子类:
    RestClusterClient, StandaloneClusterClient, YarnClusterClient, YarnClusterClientV2

    public abstract class ClusterClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the functionality necessary to submit a program to a remote cluster.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected static class  ClusterClient.LazyActorSystemLoader
      Utility class to lazily instantiate an ActorSystem.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ClusterClient.LazyActorSystemLoader actorSystemLoader
      The actor system used to communicate with the JobManager.
      (专用程序包) Optimizer compiler
      The optimizer used in the optimization of batch programs.
      private boolean detachedJobSubmission
      Switch for blocking/detached job submission of the client.
      protected Configuration flinkConfig
      Configuration of the client.
      protected HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices
      Service factory for high available.
      private JobExecutionResult lastJobExecutionResult
      For interactive invocations, the job results are only available after the ContextEnvironment has been run inside the user JAR.
      protected org.slf4j.Logger log 
      private scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration lookupTimeout
      Lookup timeout for the job manager retrieval service.
      private boolean printStatusDuringExecution
      Flag indicating whether to sysout print execution updates.
      protected scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout
      Timeout for futures.

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ClusterClient(Configuration flinkConfig)
      Creates a instance that submits the programs to the JobManager defined in the configuration.
      ClusterClient(Configuration flinkConfig, HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices)
      Creates a instance that submits the programs to the JobManager defined in the configuration.

      Triggers a savepoint for the job identified by the job id.

      Blocks until the client has determined that the cluster is ready for Job submission.

    • 字段详细资料

      • log

        protected final org.slf4j.Logger log

      • compiler

        final Optimizer compiler
        The optimizer used in the optimization of batch programs.

      • actorSystemLoader

        protected final ClusterClient.LazyActorSystemLoader actorSystemLoader
        The actor system used to communicate with the JobManager. Lazily initialized upon first use

      • flinkConfig

        protected final Configuration flinkConfig
        Configuration of the client.

      • timeout

        protected final scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout
        Timeout for futures.

      • lookupTimeout

        private final scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration lookupTimeout
        Lookup timeout for the job manager retrieval service.

      • highAvailabilityServices

        protected final HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices
        Service factory for high available.

      • printStatusDuringExecution

        private boolean printStatusDuringExecution
        Flag indicating whether to sysout print execution updates.

      • lastJobExecutionResult

        private JobExecutionResult lastJobExecutionResult
        For interactive invocations, the job results are only available after the ContextEnvironment has been run inside the user JAR. We pass the Client to every instance of the ContextEnvironment which lets us access the execution result here.

      • detachedJobSubmission

        private boolean detachedJobSubmission
        Switch for blocking/detached job submission of the client.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ClusterClient

        public ClusterClient(Configuration flinkConfig)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a instance that submits the programs to the JobManager defined in the configuration. This method will try to resolve the JobManager hostname and throw an exception if that is not possible.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The config used to obtain the job-manager's address, and used to configure the optimizer.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - we cannot create the high availability services

      • ClusterClient

        public ClusterClient(Configuration flinkConfig,
                     HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices)
        Creates a instance that submits the programs to the JobManager defined in the configuration. This method will try to resolve the JobManager hostname and throw an exception if that is not possible.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The config used to obtain the job-manager's address, and used to configure the optimizer.
        highAvailabilityServices - HighAvailabilityServices to use for leader retrieval

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Shuts down the client. This stops the internal actor system and actors.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setPrintStatusDuringExecution

        public void setPrintStatusDuringExecution(boolean print)
        Configures whether the client should print progress updates during the execution to System.out. All updates are logged via the SLF4J loggers regardless of this setting.
        参数:
        print - True to print updates to standard out during execution, false to not print them.

      • getPrintStatusDuringExecution

        public boolean getPrintStatusDuringExecution()
        返回:
        whether the client will print progress updates during the execution to System.out

      • getJobManagerAddress

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress getJobManagerAddress()
        Gets the current JobManager address (may change in case of a HA setup).
        返回:
        The address (host and port) of the leading JobManager

      • run

        public JobSubmissionResult run(PackagedProgram prog,
                               int parallelism)
                        throws ProgramInvocationException,
                               ProgramMissingJobException
        General purpose method to run a user jar from the CliFrontend in either blocking or detached mode, depending on whether setDetached(true) or setDetached(false).
        参数:
        prog - the packaged program
        parallelism - the parallelism to execute the contained Flink job
        返回:
        The result of the execution
        抛出:
        ProgramMissingJobException
        ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public JobSubmissionResult run(JobWithJars program,
                               int parallelism)
                        throws ProgramInvocationException
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public JobSubmissionResult run(JobWithJars jobWithJars,
                               int parallelism,
                               SavepointRestoreSettings savepointSettings)
                        throws CompilerException,
                               ProgramInvocationException
        Runs a program on the Flink cluster to which this client is connected. The call blocks until the execution is complete, and returns afterwards.
        参数:
        jobWithJars - The program to be executed.
        parallelism - The default parallelism to use when running the program. The default parallelism is used when the program does not set a parallelism by itself.
        抛出:
        CompilerException - Thrown, if the compiler encounters an illegal situation.
        ProgramInvocationException - Thrown, if the program could not be instantiated from its jar file, or if the submission failed. That might be either due to an I/O problem, i.e. the job-manager is unreachable, or due to the fact that the parallel execution failed.

      • run

        public JobSubmissionResult run(FlinkPlan compiledPlan,
                               java.util.List<java.net.URL> libraries,
                               java.util.List<java.net.URL> classpaths,
                               java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                        throws ProgramInvocationException
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public JobSubmissionResult run(FlinkPlan compiledPlan,

                               java.util.List<java.net.URL> classpaths,
                               java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                               SavepointRestoreSettings savepointSettings)
                        throws ProgramInvocationException

      • run

        public JobExecutionResult run(JobGraph jobGraph,
                              java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                       throws ProgramInvocationException
        Submits a JobGraph blocking.
        参数:
        jobGraph - The JobGraph
        classLoader - User code class loader to deserialize the results and errors (may contain custom classes).
        返回:
        JobExecutionResult
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException

        抛出:

        参数:
        jobID - The job id of the job to attach to
        返回:
        The JobExecutionResult for the jobID
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException - if an error occurs during monitoring the job execution

        Cancels a job identified by the job id.
        参数:
        jobId - the job id
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - In case an error occurred.

      • cancelWithSavepoint

        public java.lang.String cancelWithSavepoint(JobID jobId,
                                            @Nullable
                                            java.lang.String savepointDirectory)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Cancels a job identified by the job id and triggers a savepoint.
        参数:
        jobId - the job id
        savepointDirectory - directory the savepoint should be written to
        返回:
        path where the savepoint is located
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - In case an error cocurred.

      • stop

        public void stop(JobID jobId)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops a program on Flink cluster whose job-manager is configured in this client's configuration. Stopping works only for streaming programs. Be aware, that the program might continue to run for a while after sending the stop command, because after sources stopped to emit data all operators need to finish processing.
        参数:
        jobId - the job ID of the streaming program to stop
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the job ID is invalid (ie, is unknown or refers to a batch job) or if sending the stop signal failed. That might be due to an I/O problem, ie, the job-manager is unreachable.

      • triggerSavepoint

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> triggerSavepoint(JobID jobId,
                                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                                 java.lang.String savepointDirectory)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Triggers a savepoint for the job identified by the job id. The savepoint will be written to the given savepoint directory, or CoreOptions.SAVEPOINT_DIRECTORY if it is null.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        savepointDirectory - directory the savepoint should be written to
        返回:
        path future where the savepoint is located
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if no connection to the cluster could be established

      • listJobs

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<JobStatusMessage>> listJobs()
                                                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Lists the currently running and finished jobs on the cluster.
        返回:
        future collection of running and finished jobs
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if no connection to the cluster could be established

      • getAccumulators

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAccumulators(JobID jobID)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Requests and returns the accumulators for the given job identifier. Accumulators can be requested while a is running or after it has finished. The default class loader is used to deserialize the incoming accumulator results.
        参数:
        jobID - The job identifier of a job.
        返回:
        A Map containing the accumulator's name and its value.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAccumulators

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAccumulators(JobID jobID,
                                                                        java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Requests and returns the accumulators for the given job identifier. Accumulators can be requested while a is running or after it has finished.
        参数:
        jobID - The job identifier of a job.
        loader - The class loader for deserializing the accumulator results.
        返回:
        A Map containing the accumulator's name and its value.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • endSession

        public void endSession(JobID jobId)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Tells the JobManager to finish the session (job) defined by the given ID.
        参数:
        jobId - The ID that identifies the session.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        参数:

      • getOptimizedPlan

        private static OptimizedPlan getOptimizedPlan(Optimizer compiler,
                                              JobWithJars prog,
                                              int parallelism)
                                       throws CompilerException,
                                              ProgramInvocationException
        Creates the optimized plan for a given program, using this client's compiler.
        参数:
        prog - The program to be compiled.
        返回:
        The compiled and optimized plan, as returned by the compiler.
        抛出:
        CompilerException - Thrown, if the compiler encounters an illegal situation.
        ProgramInvocationException - Thrown, if the program could not be instantiated from its jar file.

        Logs and prints to sysout if printing to stdout is enabled.

        message - The message to log/print

      • waitForClusterToBeReady

        public abstract void waitForClusterToBeReady()
        Blocks until the client has determined that the cluster is ready for Job submission.

        This is delayed until right before job submission to report any other errors first (e.g. invalid job definitions/errors in the user jar)

      • getWebInterfaceURL

        public abstract java.lang.String getWebInterfaceURL()
        Returns an URL (as a string) to the JobManager web interface.

      • getClusterStatus

        public abstract GetClusterStatusResponse getClusterStatus()
        Returns the latest cluster status, with number of Taskmanagers and slots.

      • getNewMessages

        protected abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNewMessages()
        May return new messages from the cluster. Messages can be for example about failed containers or container launch requests.

      • getClusterIdentifier

        public abstract java.lang.String getClusterIdentifier()
        Returns a string representation of the cluster.

      • finalizeCluster

        protected abstract void finalizeCluster()
        Request the cluster to shut down or disconnect.

      • setDetached

        public void setDetached(boolean isDetached)
        Set the mode of this client (detached or blocking job execution).
        参数:
        isDetached - If true, the client will submit programs detached via the run method

      • isDetached

        public boolean isDetached()
        A flag to indicate whether this clients submits jobs detached.
        返回:
        True if the Client submits detached, false otherwise

      • getFlinkConfiguration

        public Configuration getFlinkConfiguration()
        Return the Flink configuration object.
        返回:
        The Flink configuration object

      • getMaxSlots

        public abstract int getMaxSlots()
        The client may define an upper limit on the number of slots to use.
        返回:
        -1 if unknown

      • hasUserJarsInClassPath

        public abstract boolean hasUserJarsInClassPath(java.util.List<java.net.URL> userJarFiles)
        Returns true if the client already has the user jar and providing it again would result in duplicate uploading of the jar.

      • submitJob

        protected abstract JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph jobGraph,
                                                 java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                          throws ProgramInvocationException
        Calls the subclasses' submitJob method. It may decide to simply call one of the run methods or it may perform some custom job submission logic.
        参数:
        jobGraph - The JobGraph to be submitted
        返回:
        JobSubmissionResult
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException
